name: Tiny Mafia
description:
Game description:
Create your biggest mafia syndicate and fight for fame, fortune, and influence all over the world! Epic battles, business management, and a large open world await you!

Dozens of quests, a large world to explore, regular events and micro-management.

Features:
- Vivid 3D graphics and cartoonish 2D characters;
- Upgrade your base - build new villas, buy new vehicles and additional buildings;
- Buy new weapons for your hero and give him personality;
- Explore the big world and seize influence!
- Play online with your friends!
- The game runs on almost any device and can run offline;

Download on Google play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TinyPlay.TinyMafia&hl=en-us&gl...
